sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by data model version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not fail or overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: motu
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS reportingsummary_dsdefinition (id integer not null auto_increment, name varchar(255), dsd_code varchar(255) ,created_on datetime, created_by varchar(255), primary key (id)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS reportingsummary_dataset (id integer not null auto_increment, dsd_code varchar(255), dataset_code integer, dataset_name varchar(255), primary key (id));
